title: Land for Sale in Horana
details:
60P + 25P blocks of land in Horana (650m from Panadura – Horana Highway)
7.5Km from Horana Town & 2.4 Km from Body Line factory
60P facing a main road and 25P in 20m from the main road

Very quiet peaceful area. Fast developing is seen in the vicinity.
Ideal for a good residential or Commercial purpose (warehouse, Stores, Vehicle yard, Factory or any other)

Price Rs. 225,000/- per perch (negotiable)

Please call for more information
Pan Global Property Developers (Pvt) Ltd
